paragraph: Marc Engels (c. 1965/1966 – 9 April 2020) was a Belgian film sound engineer. He won the César Award for Best Sound in 2017 for his work on The Odyssey.  Engels died of COVID-19.
I'm Dead but I Have Friends (2015)
César Award for Best Sound for The Odyssey (2017)
Nominated for Magritte Award for Best Sound for I'm Dead but I Have Friends (2016)
